citation.article-title: Maribacter stanieri sp. nov., a marine bacterium of the family Flavobacteriaceae
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of the genus Maribacter Nedashkovskaya et al. 2004 emend. Barbeyron et al. 2008
This description is based on that given by Nedashkovskaya et al. (2004) and Barbeyron et al. (2008) except that strains can reduce nitrate to nitrite.
Arginine dihydrolase, lysine- and ornithine-decarboxylases and tryptophan deaminase activities are absent.
